author: MSNBC.com
title: Shulkin: ‘Hydroxychloroquine is no drug to be experimenting on patients with at this point’
description: Former Veterans Affairs Secretary Dr. David Shulkin discusses concerns over the use of hydroxychloroquine to treat coronavirus patients, after a study conducted by the Veterans Affairs Department found that the death rate among those who used the drug was hig…

author: MSNBC.com
title: Daniels: ‘going to take a lot of changes’ for students to return safely
description: Mitch Daniels, president of Purdue University and former Indiana Governor, tells NBC’s Kasie Hunt, 'we owe it to the tens of thousands of students who are telling us they want to come to Purdue or return to Purdue and pursue their education this fall.'
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Fmr. U.S. Surgeon General: Scientists ‘having to twist themselves into pretzels’ to explain Trump’s comments
description: Former U.S. Surgeon General under George W. Bush, Dr. Richard Carmona, tells NBC’s Kasie Hunt, 'I think all of the scientists in government today are having a tough time working with the president because it appears that science is not valued.'
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Rep. Castro: Congress has to ‘put its foot down’ on economic relief for immigrants
description: Rep. Joaquin Castro (D-TX), says denying immigrants without social security numbers relief aid 'is one of the biggest injustices about what the Congress has done' in its relief efforts thus far.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Coronavirus pandemic creates new normal for funeral homes

title: Boris Johnson urges against relaxing British lockdown

title: Nervous Republicans see Trump sinking: report
description: The president's handling of coronavirus, the worsening economy and new polling have Republicans nervous that they are at risk of losing the WH and the Senate if Mr. Trump does not put the nation on a radically improved course, according to reporting.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Tape shows Trump was speaking to Dr. Birx at briefing

title: The president walks back disinfectant suggestion

author: MPX
title: First deadline for possible transition of power nears

author: MSNBC.com
title: Speaker Pelosi vows to virus-proof November election with vote-by-mail provisions
description: In the next battle in Congress for additional coronavirus relief for state and local governments, Speaker Pelosi says she will be supporting vote-by-mail provisions to protect the "life of our democracy."
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Pelosi says guaranteed income may be worth considering amid coronavirus hardships

author: Msnbc
title: Cuomo's shot across McConnell's bow: 'I dare you'

content: In the latest economic aid package to clear Congress, Democratic leaders got quite a bit of what they wanted, including significant federal investments in hospitals, but there was one top priority on which Republicans wouldn't budge. House Speaker Nancy Pelos… [+9226 chars]

title: Gov. Murphy: New Jersey is still in the thick of the fight

author: Msnbc
title: Recent history be damned, Pence, Mnuchin offer bold predictions

content: Vice President Mike Pence, told the Wall Street Journal last week that he and the White House team "truly believe" that "by early June, we could be at a place where this coronavirus epidemic is largely in the past." Soon after, the Hoosier pointed to an even … [+3141 chars]

author: MSNBC.com
title: New York Gov. Cuomo says some parts of state can reopen on May 15
description: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo says he will extend the ‘PAUSE’ regulations in many parts of the state, but some less-affected regions can reopen on May 15. Cuomo then outlines ten points to be considered during these reopening efforts.

title: Reducing jail population would lower virus death toll: report

title: Trump's disinfectant comments lead to 'stifled giggles' abroad

content: The Irish Times' Fintan O'Toole had a rather brutal column over the weekend on Donald Trump's presidency and its impact on global perceptions of the United States. "Over more than two centuries, the United States has stirred a very wide range of feelings in t… [+2914 chars]

title: Alleged Chicago house party video highlights risks to lockdown progress
